moves.22... b4 23. Qh5: Too early 23.Ne6 since 23. ... Bc8 24.Qh5 Bxe6 25.Rxe6 fxe6 26.Qxg6 Qxf2  black win.
moves.23... bxc3 24. bxc3 Rd6 25. Rb1: 25.Ne6? then 25. ... Rxe6 26. Rxe6 fxe6 27. Qxg6 Qxf2 , black win.
moves.26... Rxe6 27. Rxe6 fxe6: It's better for black to move 27. ... Nf4. If 28. Qf5 then 28. ... fxe6 29. Qh7  Kf7. 30.gxf4 Ke8.  White have weak pawns at c3 and f4.
moves.32... Qc7: If 32. ... Kf6 then 33.Re1 follow with Qg6  , checkmate white win
moves.33. Qd4+ Kd6: If 33. ... Kf5 then 34. Qg4  Ke5 35. Re1  Kd6 36. Rxe6 , white win.
